header_text: You are preparing to apply for a new job. You have a meeting with a potential employer tomorrow, and you know that a good resume will be an important factor. As you look over your resume, you think that the interviewer will be unimpressed.

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: Be the main reason you do not hear back from this employer.
Be a large factor in an eventual job offer.
